testcase.name: Validate the CheckBoxes component under Elements Tile
testcase.system-out: Given User launched a Browser...............................................passed When User opens url "https://demoqa.com"....................................passed Then User verify title of landing Page "DEMOQA".............................passed When User cliks on Elements tab.............................................passed Then User clicks on Check Box button on left rail elements..................passed And Select Notes Checkbox under Desktop.....................................passed And Select React Checkbox under WorkSpace under Documents...................passed And Select Excel File.doc Checkbox under Downloads..........................passed And User verifies selected values "notes" "react" "excelFile"...............passed And User close the browser..................................................passed

testcase.system-out: Given User launched a Browser...............................................passed When User opens url "https://demoqa.com"....................................passed Then User verify title of landing Page "DEMOQA".............................passed When User cliks on Elements tab.............................................passed Then User clicks on Radio button on left rail elements......................passed And Select Yes radio button and verify the Selected value "Yes".............passed And Select Impressive radio button and verify the Selected value "Impressive".passed And User verifies the No radio button to be disabled........................passed And User close the browser..................................................passed
